==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=哇噻}}

===Etymology===
From {{der|cmn|nan|-}} {{zh-l|我使|tr=góa sái|I [[fuck]]}}. This phrase is popular in Taiwan from 1970s, and after the Chinese economic reform, this phrase became popular in China, too. It is not offensive in Mandarin.
